title: @measure_erosion_thick
description: Compute thickness of mask using erosion method.

surfset.title: Surfset
surfset.description: Surface dataset onto which to map thickness (probably a pial/gray matter surface).

outdir.title: Output Directory
outdir.description: Output directory. If not specified, erosion_thickdir is used.

resample.title: Resample
resample.description: Resample input to mm in millimeters (put a number here). Recommended for most 1mm data.

surfsmooth.title: Surface Smooth
surfsmooth.description: Smooth surface map of thickness by mm millimeters. Default is 8 mm.

smoothmm.title: Volume Smooth
smoothmm.description: Smooth volume by mm FWHM in mask. Default is 2*voxelsize of mask or resampled mask.

maxthick.title: Maximum Thickness
maxthick.description: Search for maximum thickness value of mm millimeters. Default is 6 mm.

depthsearch.title: Depth Search
depthsearch.description: Map to surface by looking for max along mm millimeter normal vectors. Default is 3 mm.

keep_temp_files.title: Keep Temporary Files
keep_temp_files.description: Do not delete the intermediate files (for testing).

surfsmooth_method.title: Surface Smooth Method
surfsmooth_method.description: Heat method used for smoothing surfaces. Default is HEAT_07 but HEAT_05 is also useful for models.
